name: KissTheFrog
description:
KissTheFrog!

In this Alakamjam entry you have to collect the frog to bring it to the princess. Use your Spells (Left Mouse Click) to spawn objects to reach the frog. You can use A and D for walking and SPACE to jump.

Also you can hold the Left Mouse Button to see which object comes next to decide if it fits. You can only spawn eehh cast objects if you are standing on the ground or on the objects.

Tools: Unity - Gimp - BeepBox.co - Hexels
